sinks.name: TEE_Free
sinks.reason: Tainted pointer could lead to double-free or freeing unallocated memory.

sinks.name: TEE_GenerateRandom
sinks.reason: Output buffer could be shared with Normal World, leading to exposure of sensitive data.

sinks.name: TEE_GenerateRandom
sinks.reason: Size parameter could be manipulated, leading to buffer overflows or memory corruption.

sinks.name: TEE_Malloc
sinks.reason: Size parameter can be tainted, leading to buffer overflows or memory corruption.

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Destination could be a shared memory buffer accessible by the Normal World.

sinks.name: TEE_MemMove
sinks.reason: Size parameter could be manipulated to cause buffer overflows or out-of-bounds access.
